title: Parsley Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 cups firmly packed fresh parsley leaves
instructions: Place all the ingredients listed in a blender and blend at low speed for 1 minute then switch to high speed and blend for 30 seconds, or until the mixture is bright green.
The dressing keeps, covered and chilled, for 1 week.  However, stir the dressing before using and its best when served at room temperature on green salads or vegetables.
Source:  A Calendar of Herbs: Parsley by Susan Belsinger and Carolyn Dille, Gourmet Magazine, January 1980.
